channel.title: Comments on: Medical Tourism Search Engine – Reva Health Network

item.title: By: Brian O'Malley
item.dc:creator: Brian O'Malley
item.description:
Caelen mailed to say that Reva now generates in excess of one million dollars of business for hospitals and clinics worldwide every week.
â€œThe growth of our health network has been phenomenal,â€ said Caelen King, CEO of Reva Health Network. â€œWe have new hospitals and clinics joining our network on a daily basis and an ever increasing number of consumers looking for quality information. The strong desire for affordable healthcare coupled with our easily searchable directory is creating massive opportunities for international healthcare providers. This market can only grow and grow.â€
Another example of an Irish company leveraging the internet to great effect!
